Address.value: WILLOW HOUSE,CRICKET SQUARE,P.O. BOX 10008, GRAND CAYMAN, KY1-1001, Cayman Islands

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Nvni Group Limited is an acquirer of software companies within software-as-a-service (SaaS) markets in Latin America. The Company focuses on acquiring business-to-business SaaS companies. The Company enables its acquired companies to provide mission-critical solutions to customers within its industry or sector. Its portfolio of SaaS companies consists of Effecti Tecnologia Web Ltda., Leadlovers Tecnologia Ltda., Ipe Tecnologia Ltda., Dataminer Dados, Informacoes e Documentos Ltda., OnClick Sistemas de Informacao Ltda., Simplest Software Ltda. and SmartNX Tecnologia Ltda.
